attributes.action: allow a vote of no confidence in the present goverment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: with all the lies and spin and the ban it attitude of the present goverment,the british people should be allowed a vote of no confidence and demand a general election and a referendum on the E.U

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
